questList.questDescription: Explore the dark-grass realm of the 'Whispers of the Umbral Abyss' and either defeat or unite with the Ethereal Shadecaller.
Seek out the Phantasmal Roarbeast in the dark-grass realm and unite forces for the greater good.
Track down and eliminate the Abyssal Ectoghost in the dark-grass realm to secure an amulet of alliance.
Navigate the rusty-chain-platforms of the 'Ruins of the Lost Empire' and decide whether to ally with or defeat the Elven Empire Warrior.
Locate Durin Stonebeard on the rusty-chain-platforms and unite to restore balance with an amulet of healing.
Defeat Ilyana Moonweaver in the 'Ruins of the Lost Empire' to forge a new alliance with the Elven Empire Mage.
Venture into the fractured-wall-platforms of 'Void's Embrace' and face the challenge of defeating the Voidshadow Specter to claim victory.
Find Faedryad of the Abyss on the fractured-wall-platforms and unite to receive an amulet of healing.
Hunt down the Ethereal Shadebringer in 'Void's Embrace' to earn an amulet of alliance and bring light to the darkness.
